title: Library Contract Request: EBSCO Business Source Premier

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) The most recent contract, governing, base, or master license agreement with EBSCO relating to the licensing of EBSCO Business Source Premier;
2) All related terms and conditions, terms of service, amendments, addenda, appendices, attachments, product terms, MOUs, MOAs, data processing agreements, and/or letters of intent; and
3) All financial documents or records of financial transactions, exchanges or obligations related to the contractual relations with EBSCO for EBSCO Business Source Premier licensing. 

Responsive materials include all contracts, agreements, amendments, appendices, invoices, and any other documents listed above that incorporate language governing terms of use of EBSCO Business Source Premier.

Please do not limit your search to strictly direct agreements or renewals between the institution and EBSCO, but include all agreements and related documentation through consortia such as Lyrasis.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ellen Dubinsky

title: Library Contract Request: EBSCO Business Source Complete

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nebraska Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) The most recent contract, governing, base, or master license agreement with EBSCO relating to the licensing of EBSCO Business Source Complete;
2) All related terms and conditions, terms of service, amendments, addenda, appendices, attachments, product terms, MOUs, MOAs, data processing agreements, and/or letters of intent; and
3) All financial documents or records of financial transactions, exchanges or obligations related to the contractual relations with EBSCO for EBSCO Business Source Complete licensing. 

Responsive materials include all contracts, agreements, amendments, appendices, invoices, and any other documents listed above that incorporate language governing terms of use of EBSCO Business Source Complete.

Please do not limit your search to strictly direct agreements or renewals between the institution and EBSCO, but include all agreements and related documentation through consortia such as the UNCL, Big Ten Academic Alliance, or Lyrasis.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 4 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ellen Dubinsky

title: Library Contract Request: EBSCO Business Source Premier

Pursuant to the Nebraska Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:
